text: The women's 64 kg competition of the weightlifting events at the 2019 Pan American Games in Lima, Peru, was held on July 29 at the Coliseo Mariscal Caceres. ==Results== 11 athletes from ten countries took part. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" ! title: Weightlifting at the 2019 Pan American Games – Women's 64 kg
